title: History Extra podcast - July 2009 - Part 2
itunes:title: History Extra podcast - July 2009 - Part 2
itunes:subtitle: Mark Ormrod gives a colourful insight into medieval petitions; Christopher Lewis and Alison Boyle discuss two of the 17th century's greatest astronomers: Galileo and Thomas Harriot.
description:
Mark Ormrod gives a colourful insight into medieval petitions; Christopher Lewis and Alison Boyle discuss two of the 17th century's greatest astronomers: Galileo and Thomas Harriot.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
